question:
Many governments think that economic progress is their most important goal. Some people, however, think that other types of progress are equally important for a country.


Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
text: A lot of higher authorities believe that the growth of the economy is their basic target while few individuals think that development in other ways is also crucial for the nation.According to my opinion, along with wealth other progress are also necessary for the development of the country.  In this essay, I will describe  both viewpoints and give my own opinion further.

To begin with, economic progress important way  for having wealth in a country. There are three main reasons behind this. First of all,  wealthy economic conditions will help to improve job creation, a high level of employment opportunities and better salary packages. Moreover, it describes the  budget of the country. As a result, government spend it on the infrastructure and growth of the country. Such as  improvement in the transportation systems and  launching new inventions. Finally,  if the economy of the country grows the  standard of the country grows up like developed nations.

On the other hand, other progressions also have a great value for the development of the nation. The improvement  for except wealth like free education facilities, health care services and social services. For example, for decades Japan started the project of free education services    even though the economic condition was also not stable still the project was launched. However, nowadays, Japan is one of the top nations and zero illiteracy rate.
In conclusion,  it is necessary to have  economic progress along with other progressions. Other amenities are equally important for the development of the country.
